trans-unit.source: Parse an XML fragment from a resource identified by a LSInput and insert the content into an existing document at the position specified with the context and action arguments.
trans-unit.target: 从 LSInput 标识的资源中解析XML片段，然后将内容插入到现有文档中位于 context 和 action 参数指定的位置处。

trans-unit.source: Parse an XML fragment from a resource identified by a LSInput and insert the content into an existing document at the position specified with the context and action arguments. When parsing the input stream, the context node (or its parent, depending on where the result will be inserted) is used for resolving unbound namespace prefixes. The context node's ownerDocument node (or the node itself if the node of type DOCUMENT_NODE) is used to resolve default attributes and entity references.
trans-unit.target: 从 LSInput 标识的资源中解析XML片段，然后将内容插入到现有文档中位于 context 和 action 参数指定的位置处。解析输入流时，上下文节点（或其父节点，取决于要插入结果的位置）用于解析未绑定的名称空间前缀。上下文节点的 ownerDocument 节点（如果是 DOCUMENT_NODE 类型的节点，则为节点本身）用于解析默认属性和实体引用。

trans-unit.source: Parser or write operations may throw an LSException if the processing is stopped.

trans-unit.source: Parser or write operations may throw an LSException if the processing is stopped. The processing can be stopped due to a DOMError with a severity of DOMError.SEVERITY_FATAL_ERROR or a non recovered DOMError.SEVERITY_ERROR, or if DOMErrorHandler.handleError() returned false.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理停止，则解析器或写入操作可能会引发 LSException 。该处理可能由于停止向 DOMError 用的严重性 DOMError.SEVERITY_FATAL_ERROR 或非回收 DOMError.SEVERITY_ERROR ，或者如果 DOMErrorHandler.handleError() 返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: ParserFactory is not part of the platform-independent definition of SAX; it is an additional convenience class designed specifically for Java XML application writers. SAX applications can use the static methods in this class to allocate a SAX parser dynamically at run-time based either on the value of the `org.xml.sax.parser' system property or on a string containing the class name.
trans-unit.target: ParserFactory并不是SAX独立于平台的定义的一部分;它是专门为Java XML应用程序编写者设计的一个额外的方便类。SAX应用程序可以使用这个类中的静态方法在运行时根据`org.xml.sax.parser'系统属性的值或包含类名的字符串动态地分配一个SAX解析器。

trans-unit.source: Parsers configured to use this resolver method will call it to determine the input source to use for any external entity being included because of a reference in the XML text. That excludes the document entity, and any external entity returned by getExternalSubset(). When a (non-validating) processor is configured not to include a class of entities (parameter or general) through use of feature flags, this method is not invoked for such entities.
trans-unit.target: 配置为使用此解析器方法的解析器将对其进行调用，以确定由于XML文本中的引用而导致所包含的任何外部实体使用的输入源。这不包括文档实体，以及由 getExternalSubset() 返回的任何外部实体。当（非验证的）处理器配置为不通过使用功能标志来包含一类实体（参数或通用）时，不会为此类实体调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Parses the next token from the input stream of this tokenizer. The type of the next token is returned in the ttype field. Additional information about the token may be in the nval field or the sval field of this tokenizer.
trans-unit.target: 解析此令牌生成器的输入流中的下一个令牌。下一个标记的类型在 ttype 字段中返回。有关令牌的其他信息可以在此令牌生成器的 nval 字段或 sval 字段中。

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified File as a schema and returns it as a Schema.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 File 解析为模式，然后将其返回为 Schema 。

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified URL as a schema and returns it as a Schema.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 URL 解析为模式，然后将其返回为 Schema 。

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified files returning a list of abstract syntax trees.
trans-unit.target: 解析指定的文件,返回一个抽象语法树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified source as a schema and returns it as a schema.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的源解析为模式,并将其作为模式返回。

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified source(s) as a schema and returns it as a schema.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的源解析为一个模式,并将其作为一个模式返回。

trans-unit.source: Parses the string argument as a boolean.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串参数解析为布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Parses the string argument as a boolean. The boolean returned represents the value true if the string argument is not null and is equal, ignoring case, to the string "true".
trans-unit.target: 将字符串参数解析为布尔值。如果字符串参数不为 null ,并且忽略大小写，等于字符串 "true" ，则返回的 boolean 表示 true 值。

trans-unit.source: Parses the string argument as a boolean. The boolean returned represents the value true if the string argument is not null and is equal, ignoring case, to the string "true". Otherwise, a false value is returned, including for a null argument.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串参数解析为布尔值。如果字符串参数不为 null 且忽略大小写，等于字符串 "true" ，则返回的 boolean 表示 true 值。否则，将返回一个假值，包括一个空参数。

trans-unit.source: Parses the string argument as a signed byte in the radix specified by the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串参数解析为第二个参数指定的基数中的有符号 byte 。

trans-unit.source: Parses the string argument as a signed byte in the radix specified by the second argument. The characters in the string must all be digits, of the specified radix (as determined by whether Character.digit(char, int) returns a nonnegative value) except that the first character may be an ASCII minus sign '-' ('\u002D') to indicate a negative value or an ASCII plus sign '+' ('\u002B') to indicate a positive value. The resulting byte value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串参数解析为第二个参数指定的基数中的有符号 byte 。字符串中的所有字符都必须是指定基数的数字（由 Character.digit(char, int) 是否返回非负值来确定），除了第一个字符可以是ASCII减号 '-' （ '\u002D' ）表示负值，或ASCII加号 '+' （ '\u002B' ）表示正值。返回结果 byte 值。

The characters in the string must all be decimal digits, except that the first character may be an an ASCII plus sign '+' ('\u002B'). The resulting integer value is returned, exactly as if the argument and the radix 10 were given as arguments to the parseUnsignedInt(java.lang.String, int) method.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串参数解析为无符号十进制整数。字符串中的字符必须全部为十进制数字，但第一个字符可以是ASCII加号 '+' （ '\u002B' ）。返回结果整数值，就好像参数和基数10作为 parseUnsignedInt(java.lang.String, int) 方法的参数一样。

trans-unit.source: Parses the string argument as an unsigned integer in the radix specified by the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 以第二个参数指定的弧度将字符串参数解析为无符号整数。

trans-unit.source: Parses the string argument as an unsigned integer in the radix specified by the second argument. An unsigned integer maps the values usually associated with negative numbers to positive numbers larger than MAX_VALUE. The characters in the string must all be digits of the specified radix (as determined by whether Character.digit(char, int) returns a nonnegative value), except that the first character may be an ASCII plus sign '+' ('\u002B'). The resulting integer value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串参数解析为第二个参数指定的基数中的无符号整数。无符号整数将通常与负数关联的值映射到大于 MAX_VALUE 的正数。字符串中的所有字符都必须是指定基数的数字（由 Character.digit(char, int) 是否返回非负值来确定），除了第一个字符可以是ASCII加号 '+' （ '\u002B' ）。返回得到的整数值。

trans-unit.source: Parses the text, returning the appropriate Object representation of the String value. This strips the literal characters as necessary and invokes supers stringToValue, so that if you have specified a value class (setValueClass) an instance of it will be created. This will throw a ParseException if the value does not match the current mask. Refer to setValueContainsLiteralCharacters(boolean) for details on how literals are treated.

trans-unit.source: Parsing a text string occurs in two phases. Phase 1 is a basic text parse according to the fields added to the builder. Phase 2 resolves the parsed field-value pairs into date and/or time objects. This style is used to control how phase 2, resolving, happens.
trans-unit.target: 对文本字符串的解析分两个阶段进行。第1阶段是根据添加到生成器的字段进行基本的文本解析。第2阶段是将解析后的字段-值对解析为日期和/或时间对象。此样式用于控制第2阶段(解析)的发生方式。

trans-unit.source: Parsing can be case sensitive or insensitive - by default it is case sensitive. This method allows the case sensitivity setting of parsing to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 解析可以是大小写敏感的,也可以是不敏感的,默认情况下是大小写敏感的。本方法允许更改解析的大小写敏感度设置。

trans-unit.source: Parsing can be strict or lenient - by default it is strict. This controls the degree of flexibility in matching the text and sign styles.
trans-unit.target: 解析可以是严格的,也可以是宽松的,默认情况下是严格的。这控制了匹配文本和符号样式的灵活程度。

trans-unit.source: Parsing is implemented as a two-phase operation. First, the text is parsed using the layout defined by the formatter, producing a Map of field to value, a ZoneId and a Chronology. Second, the parsed data is resolved, by validating, combining and simplifying the various fields into more useful ones.

trans-unit.source: Passes back the event listener list as an array of ListenerType-listener pairs. Note that for performance reasons, this implementation passes back the actual data structure in which the listener data is stored internally! This method is guaranteed to pass back a non-null array, so that no null-checking is required in fire methods. A zero-length array of Object should be returned if there are currently no listeners. WARNING!!! Absolutely NO modification of the data contained in this array should be made -- if any such manipulation is necessary, it should be done on a copy of the array returned rather than the array itself.
trans-unit.target: 将事件列表以ListenerType-listener对的数组形式传回。请注意,出于性能考虑,这个实现传回的是内部存储监听器数据的实际数据结构!这个方法保证传回一个非空数组,所以在fire方法中不需要null-checking。这个方法保证传回一个非空数组,因此在fire方法中不需要进行null-checking。如果当前没有监听器,则应返回一个零长度的Object数组。警告!!! 绝对不能修改这个数组中包含的数据--如果需要进行任何这样的操作,应该在返回的数组副本上进行,而不是数组本身。

trans-unit.source: Pathname is the pathname of the file or directory granted the specified actions. A pathname that ends in "/*" (where "/" is the file separator character, File.separatorChar) indicates all the files and directories contained in that directory. A pathname that ends with "/-" indicates (recursively) all files and subdirectories contained in that directory. A pathname consisting of the special token "<<ALL FILES>>" matches any file.
trans-unit.target: 路径名是被授予指定操作的文件或目录的路径名。以“ / *”结尾的路径名（其中“ /”是文件分隔符 File.separatorChar ）指示该目录中包含的所有文件和目录。以“ /-”结尾的路径名（递归）指示该目录中包含的所有文件和子目录。由特殊标记“ << ALL FILES >>”组成的路径名与任何文件匹配。

trans-unit.source: Pathname is the pathname of the file or directory granted the specified actions. A pathname that ends in "/*" (where "/" is the file separator character, File.separatorChar) indicates all the files and directories contained in that directory. A pathname that ends with "/-" indicates (recursively) all files and subdirectories contained in that directory. Such a pathname is called a wildcard pathname. Otherwise, it's a simple pathname.
trans-unit.target: 路径名是被授予指定操作的文件或目录的路径名。以“ / *”结尾的路径名（其中“ /”是文件分隔符， File.separatorChar ）指示该目录中包含的所有文件和目录。以“ /-”结尾的路径名（递归）指示该目录中包含的所有文件和子目录。这样的路径名称为通配符路径名。否则，这是一个简单的路径名。

trans-unit.source: Paths associated with the default provider are generally interoperable with the java.io.File class. Paths created by other providers are unlikely to be interoperable with the abstract path names represented by java.io.File. The toPath method may be used to obtain a Path from the abstract path name represented by a java.io.File object. The resulting Path can be used to operate on the same file as the java.io.File object. In addition, the toFile method is useful to construct a File from the String representation of a Path.
trans-unit.target: 与默认 provider 关联的路径通常可与 java.io.File 类互操作。其他提供程序创建的路径不太可能与 java.io.File 表示的抽象路径名互操作。该 toPath 方法可以被用于获得一个 Path 从由A表示的抽象路径名 java.io.File 对象。生成的 Path 可用于与 java.io.File 对象在同一文件上进行操作。另外， toFile 方法对于从 Path 的 String 表示形式构造 File 很有用。

trans-unit.source: Paths may be used with the Files class to operate on files, directories, and other types of files. For example, suppose we want a BufferedReader to read text from a file "access.log". The file is located in a directory "logs" relative to the current working directory and is UTF-8 encoded.

trans-unit.source: Patterns and Their Interpretation
trans-unit.target: 模式及其解释

trans-unit.source: Patterns are based on a simple sequence of letters and symbols. A pattern is used to create a Formatter using the ofPattern(String) and ofPattern(String, Locale) methods. For example, "d MMM uuuu" will format 2011-12-03 as '3 Dec 2011'. A formatter created from a pattern can be used as many times as necessary, it is immutable and is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 模式基于简单的字母和符号序列。模式用于使用 ofPattern(String) 和 ofPattern(String, Locale) 方法创建格式化程序。例如， "d MMM uuuu" 会将2011-12-03格式设置为“ 2011年12月3日”。从模式创建的格式化程序可以根据需要多次使用，它是不可变的并且是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Patterns are based on a simple sequence of letters and symbols. A pattern is used to create a Formatter using the ofPattern(String) and ofPattern(String, Locale) methods. For example, "d MMM uuuu" will format 2011-12-03 as '3 Dec 2011'. A formatter created from a pattern can be used as many times as necessary, it is immutable and is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 模式基于字母和符号的简单序列。模式用于使用 ofPattern(String) 和 ofPattern(String, Locale) 方法创建格式化程序。例如， "d MMM uuuu" 会将2011-12-03格式设置为“ 2011年12月3日”。从模式创建的格式化程序可以根据需要多次使用，它是不可变的并且是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Patterns are separated by ";" (semicolon). Whitespace is significant and is considered part of the pattern. If a pattern includes an equals assignment, "=" it sets a limit. If a limit appears more than once the last value is used.
trans-unit.target: 模式之间用“;”分隔 （分号）。空格很重要，被认为是模式的一部分。如果模式包含等号分配，则“ = ”会设置一个限制。如果一个限制出现多次，则使用最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: Patterns containing "HH" will format and parse a two digit hour, zero-padded if necessary. Patterns containing "H" will format with no zero-padding, and parse either one or two digits. In lenient mode, the parser will be greedy and parse the maximum digits possible. The "no offset" text controls what text is printed when the total amount of the offset fields to be output is zero. Example values would be 'Z', '+00:00', 'UTC' or 'GMT'. Three formats are accepted for parsing UTC - the "no offset" text, and the plus and minus versions of zero defined by the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 包含 "HH "的模式将格式化并解析一个两位数的小时,必要时可加零。包含 "H "的模式将在格式化时不使用零填充,并解析一个或两个数字。在宽松模式下,解析器将贪婪地解析尽可能多的数字。无偏移 "文本控制当要输出的偏移字段的总量为零时打印什么文本。示例值是'Z'、'+00:00'、'UTC'或'GMT'。解析UTC有三种格式--"无偏移 "文本,以及由模式定义的零的正负版本。

trans-unit.source: Per RFC 6066, DNS hostnames are case-insensitive. Two server hostnames are equal if, and only if, they have the same name type, and the hostnames are equal in a case-independent comparison.
trans-unit.target: 根据RFC 6066，DNS主机名不区分大小写。当且仅当两个服务器的主机名具有相同的名称类型且两个主机名在大小写无关的比较中相等时，它们才相等。

trans-unit.source: Per RFC 6066, the encoded name value of a hostname is StandardCharsets.US_ASCII-compliant. However, in the previous version of the SNI extension ( RFC 4366), the encoded hostname is represented as a byte string using UTF-8 encoding. For the purpose of version tolerance, this method allows that the charset of encoded argument can be StandardCharsets.UTF_8, as well as StandardCharsets.US_ASCII. IDN.toASCII(String) is used to translate the encoded argument into ASCII Compatible Encoding (ACE) hostname.
trans-unit.target: 根据RFC 6066，主机名的编码名称值符合 StandardCharsets.US_ASCII 。但是，在先前版本的SNI扩展（RFC 4366）中，编码的主机名使用UTF-8编码表示为字节字符串。出于版本公差的目的，此方法允许 encoded 参数的字符集可以是 StandardCharsets.UTF_8 以及 StandardCharsets.US_ASCII 。 IDN.toASCII(String) 用于将 encoded 参数转换为ASCII兼容编码（ACE）主机名。

trans-unit.source: Per-component customization is also possible. When rendering a component, Nimbus checks its client property named "Nimbus.Overrides". The value of this property should be an instance of UIDefaults. Settings from that table override the UIManager settings, but for that particular component instance only. An optional client property, "Nimbus.Overrides.InheritDefaults" of type Boolean, specifies whether the overriding settings should be merged with default ones (true), or replace them (false). By default they are merged:
trans-unit.target: 也可以按组件自定义。渲染组件时，Nimbus会检查其名为“ Nimbus.Overrides”的客户端属性。此属性的值应该是 UIDefaults 的实例。该表中的设置将覆盖UIManager设置，但仅适用于该特定组件实例。布尔类型的可选客户端属性“ Nimbus.Overrides.InheritDefaults”指定应将覆盖设置与默认设置（ true ）合并还是替换默认设置（ false ）。默认情况下，它们被合并：

trans-unit.source: Performance Considerations
trans-unit.target: 性能考虑因素

trans-unit.source: Performance preferences are described by three integers whose values indicate the relative importance of short connection time, low latency, and high bandwidth. The absolute values of the integers are irrelevant; in order to choose a protocol the values are simply compared, with larger values indicating stronger preferences. If the application prefers short connection time over both low latency and high bandwidth, for example, then it could invoke this method with the values (1, 0, 0). If the application prefers high bandwidth above low latency, and low latency above short connection time, then it could invoke this method with the values (0, 1, 2).
trans-unit.target: 性能首选项由三个整数描述，三个整数的值表示较短的连接时间，较低的延迟和较高的带宽的相对重要性。整数的绝对值无关紧要；为了选择协议，仅将值进行比较，较大的值表示更强的偏好。例如，如果应用程序在短等待时间和高带宽上都希望使用较短的连接时间，则可以使用值 (1, 0, 0) 1、0、0）调用此方法。如果应用程序偏向于在低等待时间之上获得较高的带宽，而在短连接时间之上获得较低延迟，则它可以使用值 (0, 1, 2) 调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Performance preferences are described by three integers whose values indicate the relative importance of short connection time, low latency, and high bandwidth. The absolute values of the integers are irrelevant; in order to choose a protocol the values are simply compared, with larger values indicating stronger preferences. Negative values represent a lower priority than positive values. If the application prefers short connection time over both low latency and high bandwidth, for example, then it could invoke this method with the values (1, 0, 0). If the application prefers high bandwidth above low latency, and low latency above short connection time, then it could invoke this method with the values (0, 1, 2).
trans-unit.target: 性能首选项由三个整数描述，三个整数的值表示较短的连接时间，较低的延迟和较高的带宽的相对重要性。整数的绝对值无关紧要；为了选择协议，仅将值进行比较，较大的值表示更强的偏好。负值表示的优先级低于正值。例如，如果应用程序在短等待时间和高带宽上都希望使用较短的连接时间，则可以使用值 (1, 0, 0) 1、0、0）调用此方法。如果应用程序偏向于在低等待时间之上获得较高的带宽，而在短连接时间之上获得较低延迟，则它可以使用值 (0, 1, 2) 调用此方法。

If the application prefers short connection time over both low latency and high bandwidth, for example, then it could invoke this method with the values (1, 0, 0). trans-unit.source: Performs a bulk copy from given source segment to this segment.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的源段批量复制到此段。

trans-unit.source: Performs a bulk copy from given source segment to this segment. More specifically, the bytes at offset 0 through src.byteSize() - 1 in the source segment are copied into this segment at offset 0 through src.byteSize() - 1. If the source segment overlaps with this segment, then the copying is performed as if the bytes at offset 0 through src.byteSize() - 1 in the source segment were first copied into a temporary segment with size bytes, and then the contents of the temporary segment were copied into this segment at offset 0 through src.byteSize() - 1.
trans-unit.target: 执行从给定源段到此段的批量复制。更具体地说，在偏移字节 0 通过 src.byteSize() - 1 在源段被复制到该段，在偏移 0 至 src.byteSize() - 1 。如果源段与此段重叠，则执行复制，就好像源段中偏移量为 0 到 src.byteSize() - 1 的字节首先复制到具有size bytes 的临时段中，然后将通过 src.byteSize() - 1 将临时段复制到此偏移量为 0 的段中。

trans-unit.source: Performs a convolution on BufferedImages.
trans-unit.target: 对BufferedImages进行卷积。

trans-unit.source: Performs a convolution on BufferedImages. Each component of the source image will be convolved (including the alpha component, if present). If the color model in the source image is not the same as that in the destination image, the pixels will be converted in the destination. If the destination image is null, a BufferedImage will be created with the source ColorModel. The IllegalArgumentException may be thrown if the source is the same as the destination.
trans-unit.target: 对BufferedImages进行卷积。源图像的每个分量都将被卷积(包括alpha分量,如果存在的话)。如果源图像中的颜色模型与目标图像中的颜色模型不同,则在目标图像中转换像素。如果目标图像为空,将用源ColorModel创建一个BufferedImage。如果源图像与目标图像相同,可能会抛出IllegalArgumentException。

trans-unit.source: Performs a convolution on Rasters.
trans-unit.target: 对Rasters进行卷积。

trans-unit.source: Performs a convolution on Rasters. Each band of the source Raster will be convolved. The source and destination must have the same number of bands. If the destination Raster is null, a new Raster will be created. The IllegalArgumentException may be thrown if the source is the same as the destination.
trans-unit.target: 对Raster进行卷积。源栅格的每个波段都将被卷积。源栅格和目标栅格的频带数必须相同。如果目标Raster为空,则会创建一个新的Raster,如果源Raster为空,则会抛出IllegalArgumentException。如果源栅格与目标栅格相同,则会产生IllegalArgumentException。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical AND of this target bit set with the argument bit set. This bit set is modified so that each bit in it has the value true if and only if it both initially had the value true and the corresponding bit in the bit set argument also had the value true.
trans-unit.target: 执行此目标位集与参数位集的逻辑与。修改此位集，以便当且仅当它最初都具有值 true 且位集参数中的相应位也具有值 true 时，其中的每个位才具有 true 值。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical OR of this bit set with the bit set argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用bit set参数对该位设置执行逻辑或。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical OR of this bit set with the bit set argument. This bit set is modified so that a bit in it has the value true if and only if it either already had the value true or the corresponding bit in the bit set argument has the value true.
trans-unit.target: 使用bit set参数对该位设置执行逻辑或。此位设置被修改，使得在某个位值为 true 当且仅当它要么已经有了值 true 或位设定参数对应位的值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical XOR of this bit set with the bit set argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用bit set参数对该位集执行逻辑XOR。

trans-unit.source: Performs a lookup operation on a BufferedImage.
trans-unit.target: 在 BufferedImage 上执行查找操作。

trans-unit.source: Performs a lookup operation on a BufferedImage. If the color model in the source image is not the same as that in the destination image, the pixels will be converted in the destination. If the destination image is null, a BufferedImage will be created with an appropriate ColorModel. An IllegalArgumentException might be thrown if the number of arrays in the LookupTable does not meet the restrictions stated in the class comment above, or if the source image has an IndexColorModel.
trans-unit.target: 在 BufferedImage 上执行查找操作。如果源图像中的颜色模型与目标图像中的颜色模型不同，则将在目标中转换像素。如果目标图像为 null ，则将使用适当的 ColorModel 创建一个 BufferedImage 。一个 IllegalArgumentException 如果阵列中的数量可能会抛出 LookupTable 中不符合上述类注释中规定的限制，或者源图像有一个 IndexColorModel 的。

trans-unit.source: Performs a lookup operation on a Raster.
trans-unit.target: 在 Raster 上执行查找操作。

trans-unit.source: Performs a lookup operation on a Raster. If the destination Raster is null, a new Raster will be created. The IllegalArgumentException might be thrown if the source Raster and the destination Raster do not have the same number of bands or if the number of arrays in the LookupTable does not meet the restrictions stated in the class comment above.
trans-unit.target: 在 Raster 上执行查找操作。如果目标 Raster 为 null ，则将创建一个新的 Raster 。如果源 Raster 和目标 Raster 的波段数不相同，或者 LookupTable 中的数组数不满足上面的类注释中所述的限制， IllegalArgumentException 可能引发IllegalArgumentException。

trans-unit.source: Performs a single-input/single-output operation from a source Raster to a destination Raster.
trans-unit.target: 从源栅格到目标栅格执行单输入/单输出操作。

trans-unit.source: Performs a single-input/single-output operation from a source Raster to a destination Raster. If the destination Raster is null, a new Raster will be created. The IllegalArgumentException may be thrown if the source and/or destination Raster is incompatible with the types of Rasters allowed by the class implementing this filter.
trans-unit.target: 执行从源光栅到目标光栅的单输入/单输出操作。如果目标Raster为空,则会创建一个新的Raster,如果源Raster和/或目标Raster不兼容,则会抛出IllegalArgumentException。如果源和/或目标栅格与实现该过滤器的类所允许的栅格类型不兼容,则会抛出IllegalArgumentException。

trans-unit.source: Performs a single-input/single-output operation on a BufferedImage.
trans-unit.target: 在 BufferedImage 上执行单输入/单输出操作。

trans-unit.source: Performs a single-input/single-output operation on a BufferedImage. If the color models for the two images do not match, a color conversion into the destination color model is performed. If the destination image is null, a BufferedImage with an appropriate ColorModel is created.
trans-unit.target: 在 BufferedImage 上执行单输入/单输出操作。如果两个图像的颜色模型不匹配，则将颜色转换为目标颜色模型。如果目标图像为空，则创建具有适当 ColorModel 的 BufferedImage 。

trans-unit.source: Performs a synchronization operation on each call site in the given array, forcing all other threads to throw away any cached values previously loaded from the target of any of the call sites.
trans-unit.target: 在给定数组中的每个调用站点上执行同步操作,迫使所有其他线程扔掉之前从任何一个调用站点的目标中加载的任何缓存值。

trans-unit.source: Performs an action when method tryComplete() is invoked and the pending count is zero, or when the unconditional method complete(T) is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当调用方法 tryComplete() 且未决计数为零时，或在调用无条件方法 complete(T) 时,执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Performs an action when method tryComplete() is invoked and the pending count is zero, or when the unconditional method complete(T) is invoked. By default, this method does nothing. You can distinguish cases by checking the identity of the given caller argument. If not equal to this, then it is typically a subtask that may contain results (and/or links to other results) to combine.
trans-unit.target: 当调用方法 tryComplete() 且未决计数为零时，或在调用无条件方法 complete(T) 时,执行操作。默认情况下，此方法不执行任何操作。您可以通过检查给定调用方参数的身份来区分大小写。如果不等于 this ，那么通常它是一个子任务，可能包含要组合的结果（和/或指向其他结果的链接）。

trans-unit.source: Performs an action when method tryComplete() is invoked and the pending count is zero, or when the unconditional method complete(T) is invoked. By default, this method does nothing. You can distinguish cases by checking the identity of the given caller argument. If not equal to this, then it is typically a subtask that may contain results (and/or links to other results) to combine.
trans-unit.target: 当调用方法 tryComplete() 且未决计数为零时，或在调用无条件方法 complete(T) 时执行操作。默认情况下，此方法不执行任何操作。您可以通过检查给定调用方参数的身份来区分大小写。如果不等于 this ，那么通常它是一个子任务，可能包含要组合的结果（和/或指向其他结果的链接）。

trans-unit.source: Performs an action when method ForkJoinTask.completeExceptionally(Throwable) is invoked or method compute() throws an exception, and this task has not already otherwise completed normally.
trans-unit.target: 当调用方法 ForkJoinTask.completeExceptionally(Throwable) 或方法 compute() 引发异常，并且此任务尚未正常完成时，执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Performs an action when method ForkJoinTask.completeExceptionally(Throwable) is invoked or method compute() throws an exception, and this task has not already otherwise completed normally. On entry to this method, this task ForkJoinTask.isCompletedAbnormally(). The return value of this method controls further propagation: If true and this task has a completer that has not completed, then that completer is also completed exceptionally, with the same exception as this completer. The default implementation of this method does nothing except return true.
trans-unit.target: 当调用方法 ForkJoinTask.completeExceptionally(Throwable) 或方法 compute() 引发异常，并且此任务尚未正常完成时，执行操作。在进入此方法时，此任务 ForkJoinTask.isCompletedAbnormally() 。此方法的返回值控制进一步的传播：如果为 true 且此任务的完成程序尚未完成，则该完成程序也将异常完成，但与此完成程序相同。此方法的默认实现除了返回 true 之外不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Performs an action when method ForkJoinTask.completeExceptionally(Throwable) is invoked or method compute() throws an exception, and this task has not already otherwise completed normally. On entry to this method, this task ForkJoinTask.isCompletedAbnormally(). The return value of this method controls further propagation: If true and this task has a completer that has not completed, then that completer is also completed exceptionally, with the same exception as this completer. The default implementation of this method does nothing except return true.
trans-unit.target: 当调用方法 ForkJoinTask.completeExceptionally(Throwable) 或方法 compute() 引发异常，并且此任务尚未正常完成时，执行操作。在进入此方法时，此任务 ForkJoinTask.isCompletedAbnormally() 。此方法的返回值控制进一步的传播：如果为 true 且此任务有一个尚未完成的完成程序，则该完成程序也会异常完成，但与此完成程序相同。此方法的默认实现除了返回 true 之外不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Performs an unchecked "crack" of a direct method handle.
trans-unit.target: 对直接方法句柄执行未经检查的“破解” 。

trans-unit.source: Performs an unchecked "crack" of a direct method handle. The result is as if the user had obtained a lookup object capable enough to crack the target method handle, called Lookup.revealDirect on the target to obtain its symbolic reference, and then called MethodHandleInfo.reflectAs to resolve the symbolic reference to a member.
trans-unit.target: 对直接方法句柄执行未经检查的“破解” 。结果就好像用户已经获得了一个足以破解目标方法句柄的查找对象 Lookup.revealDirect ，在目标上称为Lookup.revealDirect以获取其符号引用，然后又调用 MethodHandleInfo.reflectAs 来解析对成员的符号引用。

trans-unit.source: Performs an unchecked "crack" of a direct method handle. The result is as if the user had obtained a lookup object capable enough to crack the target method handle, called Lookup.revealDirect on the target to obtain its symbolic reference, and then called MethodHandleInfo.reflectAs to resolve the symbolic reference to a member.
trans-unit.target: 对直接方法句柄执行未经检查的“破解” 。结果就好像用户已经获得了一个足以破解目标方法句柄的查找对象 Lookup.revealDirect ，在目标上称为Lookup.revealDirect以获取其符号引用，然后又调用 MethodHandleInfo.reflectAs 来解析对成员的符号引用。

trans-unit.source: Performs the given task, returning its result upon completion. If the computation encounters an unchecked Exception or Error, it is rethrown as the outcome of this invocation. Rethrown exceptions behave in the same way as regular exceptions, but, when possible, contain stack traces (as displayed for example using ex.printStackTrace()) of both the current thread as well as the thread actually encountering the exception; minimally only the latter.
trans-unit.target: 执行给定的任务，完成后返回其结果。如果计算遇到未经检查的异常或错误，则将其作为该调用的结果重新抛出。重新引发的异常的行为与常规异常相同，但是在可能的情况下，它包含当前线程以及实际遇到该异常的线程的堆栈跟踪（例如，使用 ex.printStackTrace() 显示）。最少只有后者。

This method should never be called by an application, but is called from with a RowSet implementation extending this class.

trans-unit.source: Perl uses the g flag to request a match that resumes where the last match left off. This functionality is provided implicitly by the Matcher class: Repeated invocations of the find method will resume where the last match left off, unless the matcher is reset.
trans-unit.target: Perl使用 g 标志来请求匹配，该匹配将从上次匹配结束的地方继续。 Matcher 类隐式提供了此功能：除非重置了Matcher，否则重复调用 find 方法将从上次匹配结束的地方继续。

trans-unit.source: Perl uses the g flag to request a match that resumes where the last match left off. This functionality is provided implicitly by the Matcher class: Repeated invocations of the find method will resume where the last match left off, unless the matcher is reset.

trans-unit.source: Permission controlling access to MBeanServer operations. If a security manager has been set using System.setSecurityManager(java.lang.SecurityManager), most operations on the MBean Server require that the caller's permissions imply an MBeanPermission appropriate for the operation. This is described in detail in the documentation for the MBeanServer interface.
trans-unit.target: 权限，用于控制对MBeanServer操作的访问。如果使用 System.setSecurityManager(java.lang.SecurityManager) 设置了安全管理器，则MBean Server上的大多数操作都要求调用者的权限隐含适合该操作的MBeanPermission。 MBeanServer 接口的文档中对此进行了详细描述。

trans-unit.source: Permissions
trans-unit.target: Permissions

trans-unit.source: Permissions are generally used for two purposes: to protect caches of objects obtained through URLConnections, and to check the right of a recipient to learn about a particular URL. In the first case, the permission should be obtained after the object has been obtained. For example, in an HTTP connection, this will represent the permission to connect to the host from which the data was ultimately fetched. In the second case, the permission should be obtained and tested before connecting.
trans-unit.target: 权限通常用于两个目的：保护通过URLConnections获得的对象的缓存，以及检查接收者了解特定URL的权限。在第一种情况下，应在获得对象之后获得许可。例如，在HTTP连接中，这表示连接到最终从中获取数据的主机的权限。在第二种情况下，应在连接之前获得许可并进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Permissions fall into these categories: File, Socket, Net, Security, Runtime, Property, AWT, Reflect, and Serializable. The classes managing these various permission categories are java.io.FilePermission, java.net.SocketPermission, java.net.NetPermission, java.security.SecurityPermission, java.lang.RuntimePermission, java.util.PropertyPermission, java.awt.AWTPermission, java.lang.reflect.ReflectPermission, and java.io.SerializablePermission.
trans-unit.target: 权限分为以下几类：文件，套接字，网络，安全性，运行时，属性，AWT，反射和可序列化。管理这些各种权限类别的类是 java.io.FilePermission ， java.net.SocketPermission ， java.net.NetPermission ， java.security.SecurityPermission ， java.lang.RuntimePermission ， java.util.PropertyPermission ， java.awt.AWTPermission ， java.lang.reflect.ReflectPermission 和 java.io.SerializablePermission 。

trans-unit.source: Phantom reference objects, which are enqueued after the collector determines that their referents may otherwise be reclaimed. Phantom references are most often used for scheduling pre-mortem cleanup actions in a more flexible way than is possible with the Java finalization mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 幻影引用对象,它在收集器确定其引用可能以其他方式被回收后被enqueued。幻影引用最常用于调度死前清理行动,其方式比Java最终化机制更加灵活。

trans-unit.source: Pixels that are of colors other than those two colors are changed in an unpredictable but reversible manner; if the same figure is drawn twice, then all pixels are restored to their original values.

trans-unit.source: Pixels that land, after subsampling, within the destination image, and that are written in one of the progressive passes specified by getSourceMinProgressivePass and getSourceNumProgressivePasses are passed along to the next step.
trans-unit.target: 二次采样后降落在目标图像内的像素，并以 getSourceMinProgressivePass 和 getSourceNumProgressivePasses 指定的渐进路径之一写入，这些像素将传递到下一步。

trans-unit.source: Place the component centered along the edge of its display area associated with the end of a page for the current ComponentOrientation.
trans-unit.target: 将组件置于与当前 ComponentOrientation 的页面末尾关联的其显示区域的边缘居中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Place the component centered along the edge of its display area associated with the end of a page for the current ComponentOrientation. Equal to SOUTH for horizontal orientations.
trans-unit.target: 将组件置于与当前 ComponentOrientation 的页面末尾关联的其显示区域的边缘居中的位置。水平方向等于SOUTH。

trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在与当前 ComponentOrientation 的页面开头相关联的其显示区域边缘的中心。水平方向等于北。

trans-unit.source: Place the component centered along the edge of its display area where lines of text would normally begin for the current ComponentOrientation.
trans-unit.target: 将组件沿其显示区域的边缘居中放置，对于当前 ComponentOrientation ，该行通常以文本行开始。

trans-unit.source: Place the component centered along the edge of its display area where lines of text would normally begin for the current ComponentOrientation. Equal to WEST for horizontal, left-to-right orientations and EAST for horizontal, right-to-left orientations.
trans-unit.target: 将组件沿其显示区域的边缘居中放置，对于当前 ComponentOrientation ，该行通常以文本行开始。水平方向（从左到右）等于WEST，水平方向（从右到左）等于EAST。

trans-unit.source: Place the component centered along the edge of its display area where lines of text would normally end for the current ComponentOrientation.
trans-unit.target: 将组件沿其显示区域的边缘居中放置，对于当前 ComponentOrientation ，文本行通常在该行的结尾处结束。

trans-unit.source: Place the component centered along the edge of its display area where lines of text would normally end for the current ComponentOrientation. Equal to EAST for horizontal, left-to-right orientations and WEST for horizontal, right-to-left orientations.
trans-unit.target: 将组件沿其显示区域的边缘居中放置，对于当前 ComponentOrientation ，文本行通常在该行的结尾处结束。对于水平方向（从左到右），等于EAST；对于水平方向（从右到左），等于WEST。

trans-unit.source: Place the component in the corner of its display area where the first line of text on a page would normally begin for the current ComponentOrientation.
trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在其显示区域的一角，该位置通常是页面上第一行文本开始于当前 ComponentOrientation 的位置。

trans-unit.source: Place the component in the corner of its display area where the first line of text on a page would normally begin for the current ComponentOrientation. Equal to NORTHWEST for horizontal, left-to-right orientations and NORTHEAST for horizontal, right-to-left orientations.
trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在其显示区域的一角，该位置通常是页面上第一行文本开始于当前 ComponentOrientation 的位置。对于水平方向（从左到右），等于NORTHWEST；对于水平方向（从右到左），等于NORTHEAST。

trans-unit.source: Place the component in the corner of its display area where the first line of text on a page would normally end for the current ComponentOrientation.
trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在其显示区域的一角，页面上的第一行文本通常会在当前 ComponentOrientation 的结尾处结束。

trans-unit.source: Place the component in the corner of its display area where the first line of text on a page would normally end for the current ComponentOrientation. Equal to NORTHEAST for horizontal, left-to-right orientations and NORTHWEST for horizontal, right-to-left orientations.
trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在其显示区域的一角，页面上的第一行文本通常会在当前 ComponentOrientation 的结尾处结束。对于水平方向（从左到右），等于NORTHEAST；对于水平方向（从右到左），等于NORTHWEST。

trans-unit.source: Place the component in the corner of its display area where the last line of text on a page would normally end for the current ComponentOrientation.
trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在其显示区域的一角，页面上的最后一行通常对于当前 ComponentOrientation 而言会在此结束。

trans-unit.source: Place the component in the corner of its display area where the last line of text on a page would normally end for the current ComponentOrientation. Equal to SOUTHEAST for horizontal, left-to-right orientations and SOUTHWEST for horizontal, right-to-left orientations.
trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在其显示区域的一角，页面上的最后一行通常对于当前 ComponentOrientation 而言会在此结束。对于水平方向（从左到右），等于SOUTHEAST；对于水平方向（从右到左），等于SOUTHWEST。

trans-unit.source: Place the component in the corner of its display area where the last line of text on a page would normally start for the current ComponentOrientation.
trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在其显示区域的一角，该位置通常是页面上最后一行针对当前 ComponentOrientation 的文本。

trans-unit.source: Place the component in the corner of its display area where the last line of text on a page would normally start for the current ComponentOrientation. Equal to SOUTHWEST for horizontal, left-to-right orientations and SOUTHEAST for horizontal, right-to-left orientations.
trans-unit.target: 将组件放置在其显示区域的一角，该位置通常是页面上最后一行针对当前 ComponentOrientation 的文本。对于水平，从左到右的方向，等于SOUTHWEST；对于水平，从右到左的方向，等于SOUTHEAST。

trans-unit.source: Places the input stream for this socket at "end of stream". Any data sent to the input stream side of the socket is acknowledged and then silently discarded.
trans-unit.target: 将该套接字的输入流置于 "流的末端"。发送到套接字输入流侧的任何数据都会被确认,然后默默地被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Places the input stream for this socket at "end of stream". Any data sent to this socket is acknowledged and then silently discarded. If you read from a socket input stream after invoking this method on the socket, the stream's available method will return 0, and its read methods will return -1 (end of stream).
trans-unit.target: 将此套接字的输入流放在“流的末尾”。发送到此套接字的所有数据都会得到确认，然后将其静默丢弃。如果在套接字上调用此方法后从套接字输入流中读取，则该流的 available 方法将返回0，而其 read 方法将返回 -1 （流的末尾）。

trans-unit.source: Places this Window at the bottom of the stacking order and shows it behind any other Windows in this VM. No action will take place is this Window is not visible. Some platforms do not allow Windows which are owned by other Windows to appear below their owners. Every attempt will be made to move this Window as low as possible in the stacking order; however, developers should not assume that this method will move this Window below all other windows in every situation.
trans-unit.target: 将此窗口置于堆叠顺序的底部,并显示在此 VM 中任何其他窗口的后面。如果此窗口不可见,则不会进行任何操作。某些平台不允许其他窗口所拥有的窗口显示在其所有者之下。我们会尽一切努力将此窗口在堆叠顺序中尽可能地移到较低的位置;但是,开发人员不应假设此方法会在所有情况下将此窗口移到所有其他窗口的下方。

trans-unit.source: Places this Window at the top of the stacking order and shows it in front of any other Windows in this VM. No action will take place if this Window is not visible. Some platforms do not allow Windows which own other Windows to appear on top of those owned Windows. Some platforms may not permit this VM to place its Windows above windows of native applications, or Windows of other VMs. This permission may depend on whether a Window in this VM is already focused. Every attempt will be made to move this Window as high as possible in the stacking order; however, developers should not assume that this method will move this Window above all other windows in every situation.
trans-unit.target: 将此窗口置于堆叠顺序的顶部,并将其显示在此 VM 中的任何其他窗口之前。如果此窗口不可见,则不会进行任何操作。某些平台不允许拥有其他窗口的窗口显示在这些拥有的窗口之上。某些平台可能不允许此虚拟机将其窗口置于本机应用程序的窗口或其他虚拟机的窗口之上。此权限可能取决于此虚拟机中的窗口是否已被聚焦。我们会尽一切努力将此窗口在堆叠顺序中尽可能地移到较高的位置;但是,开发人员不应假设此方法在任何情况下都会将此窗口移到所有其他窗口之上。

trans-unit.source: Platforms offer customization of the amount of scrolling that should take place when the mouse wheel is moved. The two most common settings are to scroll a certain number of "units" (commonly lines of text in a text-based component) or an entire "block" (similar to page-up/page-down). The MouseWheelEvent offers methods for conforming to the underlying platform settings. These platform settings can be changed at any time by the user. MouseWheelEvents reflect the most recent settings.
trans-unit.target: 平台提供自定义鼠标滚轮移动时的滚动量。两个最常见的设置是滚动一定数量的 "单位"(通常是基于文本的组件中的文本行)或整个 "块"(类似于上/下页)。MouseWheelEvent提供了符合底层平台设置的方法。这些平台设置可以由用户随时更改。MouseWheelEvents反映了最新的设置。

trans-unit.source: Playback of an audio clip may be started and stopped using the start and stop methods. These methods do not reset the media position; start causes playback to continue from the position where playback was last stopped. To restart playback from the beginning of the clip's audio data, simply follow the invocation of stop with setFramePosition(0), which rewinds the media to the beginning of the clip.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 start 和 stop 方法开始和停止音频剪辑的播放。这些方法不会重设介质位置。 start 使播放从上次停止播放的位置继续播放。要从剪辑的音频数据的开头重新开始播放，只需使用 setFramePosition(0) 跟随 stop 的调用，即可将媒体倒带到剪辑的开头。

trans-unit.source: Playback of an audio clip may be started and stopped using the start and stop methods. To restart playback from the beginning of the clip's audio data, simply follow the invocation of stop with setFramePosition(0), which rewinds the media to the beginning of the clip.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 start 和 stop 方法开始和停止音频剪辑的播放。这些方法不会重设介质位置。 start 使播放从上次停止播放的位置继续播放。要从剪辑音频数据的开头重新开始播放，只需使用setFramePosition（0）跟随 stop 的调用，即可将媒体倒回到剪辑的开头。

trans-unit.source: Please note that granting this permission with the "modifyPrincipals", "modifyPublicCredentials" or "modifyPrivateCredentials" target allows a JAAS login module to populate principal or credential objects into the Subject. Although reading information inside the private credentials set requires a PrivateCredentialPermission of the credential type to be granted, reading information inside the principals set and the public credentials set requires no additional permission. These objects can contain potentially sensitive information. For example, login modules that read local user information or perform a Kerberos login are able to add potentially sensitive information such as user ids, groups and domain names to the principals set.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用“ modifyPrincipals”，“ modifyPublicCredentials”或“ modifyPrivateCredentials”目标授予此权限将使JAAS登录模块将主体或凭证对象填充到Subject中。尽管读取私有凭据集内的信息需要授予凭据类型的 PrivateCredentialPermission ，但是读取主体集和公共凭据集内的信息则不需要其他权限。这些对象可能包含潜在的敏感信息。例如，读取本地用户信息或执行Kerberos登录的登录模块能够将潜在的敏感信息（例如用户ID，组和域名）添加到主体集。

trans-unit.source: Please note that the keytab file can be created after the KeyTab object is instantiated and its content may change over time. Therefore, an application should call this method only when it needs to use the keys. Any previous result from an earlier invocation could potentially be expired.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以在实例化 KeyTab 对象之后创建keytab文件，并且其内容可能会随时间变化。因此，应用程序仅在需要使用键时才应调用此方法。先前调用的任何先前结果都可能过期。

trans-unit.source: Please note that while the Instantiate_function defined in NIST SP 800-90Ar1 only includes a prediction_resistance_flag parameter, the Capability type includes an extra value RESEED_ONLY because reseeding is an optional function. If NONE is used in an Instantiation object in calling the SecureRandom.getInstance method, the returned DRBG instance is not guaranteed to support reseeding. If RESEED_ONLY or PR_AND_RESEED is used, the instance must support reseeding.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，尽管NIST SP 800-90Ar1中定义的 Instantiate_function 仅包含 prediction_resistance_flag 参数，但是 Capability 类型包含额外的值 RESEED_ONLY ,因为reseeding是可选函数。如果在调用 SecureRandom.getInstance 方法的 Instantiation 对象中使用 NONE ，则不能保证返回的DRBG实例支持重新播种。如果使用 RESEED_ONLY 或 PR_AND_RESEED ，则实例必须支持重新播种。

trans-unit.source: Please note the constructors getInstance() and getInstance(java.io.File) were created when there was no support for unbound keytabs. These methods should not be used anymore. An object created with either of these methods are considered to be bound to an unknown principal, which means, its isBound() returns true and getPrincipal() returns null.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当不支持未绑定键表时，将创建构造函数 getInstance() 和 getInstance(java.io.File) 。这些方法不应再使用。使用这两种方法之一创建的对象都被视为绑定到未知的主体，这意味着其 isBound() 返回true，而 getPrincipal() 返回null。

trans-unit.source: Please note: In the javax.print APIs, a null reference parameter to methods is incorrect unless explicitly documented on the method as having a meaningful interpretation. Usage to the contrary is incorrect coding and may result in a run time exception either immediately or at some later time. IllegalArgumentException and NullPointerException are examples of typical and acceptable run time exceptions for such cases.

trans-unit.source: Plug-in Architecture
trans-unit.target: 插件式结构

trans-unit.source: Plug-in writers may extend the functionality of ImageReadParam by providing a subclass that implements additional, plug-in specific interfaces. It is up to the plug-in to document what interfaces are available and how they are to be used. Readers will silently ignore any extended features of an ImageReadParam subclass of which they are not aware. Also, they may ignore any optional features that they normally disable when creating their own ImageReadParam instances via getDefaultReadParam.
trans-unit.target: 插件编写器可以通过提供实现其他插件特定接口的子类来扩展 ImageReadParam 的功能。由插件决定是否可以使用哪些接口以及如何使用它们。读者将默默地忽略自己不知道的 ImageReadParam 子类的任何扩展功能。此外，他们可能会忽略通过 getDefaultReadParam 创建自己的 ImageReadParam 实例时通常禁用的任何可选功能。

trans-unit.source: Plug-in writers may extend the functionality of ImageWriteParam by providing a subclass that implements additional, plug-in specific interfaces. It is up to the plug-in to document what interfaces are available and how they are to be used. Writers will silently ignore any extended features of an ImageWriteParam subclass of which they are not aware. Also, they may ignore any optional features that they normally disable when creating their own ImageWriteParam instances via getDefaultWriteParam.
trans-unit.target: 插件编写器可以通过提供实现其他插件特定接口的子类来扩展 ImageWriteParam 的功能。由插件决定是否可以使用哪些接口以及如何使用它们。编写者将默默地忽略他们不知道的 ImageWriteParam 子类的任何扩展功能。此外，他们可能会忽略通过 getDefaultWriteParam 创建自己的 ImageWriteParam 实例时通常禁用的任何可选功能。

trans-unit.source: Plug-ins are located via a ServiceLoader, using the same class path as annotation processors (i.e. ANNOTATION_PROCESSOR_PATH or -processorpath).
trans-unit.target: 插件通过 ServiceLoader 定位，使用与注释处理器相同的类路径（即 ANNOTATION_PROCESSOR_PATH 或 -processorpath ）。

trans-unit.source: Plug-ins may choose to support a standard (plug-in neutral) format . This format does not provide lossless encoding of metadata, but allows a portion of the metadata to be accessed in a generic manner.
trans-unit.target: 插件可以选择支持标准（非插件中性）格式。这种格式不提供元数据的无损编码，但是允许以通用方式访问元数据的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Populates table with mappings from uiClassID to the fully qualified name of the ui class.

trans-unit.source: Populates table with mappings from uiClassID to the fully qualified name of the ui class. MetalLookAndFeel registers an entry for each of the classes in the package javax.swing.plaf.metal that are named MetalXXXUI. The string XXX is one of Swing's uiClassIDs. For the uiClassIDs that do not have a class in metal, the corresponding class in javax.swing.plaf.basic is used. For example, metal does not have a class named "MetalColorChooserUI", as such, javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicColorChooserUI is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用从 uiClassID 到ui类的全限定名的映射填充 table 。 MetalLookAndFeel 为包 javax.swing.plaf.metal 中每个名为MetalXXXUI的类注册一个条目。字符串 XXX 是Swing的uiClassID之一。对于在 uiClassIDs 中没有类的uiClassID，将使用 javax.swing.plaf.basic 中的相应类。例如，金属没有名为 "MetalColorChooserUI" 类，因此使用 javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicColorChooserUI 。

trans-unit.source: Populates table with mappings from uiClassID to the fully qualified name of the ui class. The value for a particular uiClassID is "javax.swing.plaf.basic.Basic + uiClassID". For example, the value for the uiClassIDTreeUI is "javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTreeUI".
trans-unit.target: 使用从 uiClassID 到ui类的全限定名的映射填充 table 。特定 uiClassID 的值为 "javax.swing.plaf.basic.Basic + uiClassID" 。例如， uiClassID TreeUI 的值为 "javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTreeUI" 。

trans-unit.source: Popups are used to display a Component to the user, typically on top of all the other Components in a particular containment hierarchy. Popups have a very small life cycle. Once you have obtained a Popup, and hidden it (invoked the hide method), you should no longer invoke any methods on it. This allows the PopupFactory to cache Popups for later use.
trans-unit.target: 弹出窗口通常用于在特定容纳层次结构中的所有其他 Component 之上向用户显示 Component 。 Popup 的生命周期非常小。一旦获得 Popup 并将其隐藏（调用了 hide 方法），就不应再对其调用任何方法。这允许 PopupFactory 缓存 Popup ,以供以后使用。

trans-unit.source: Ports are simple lines for input or output of audio to or from audio devices.
trans-unit.target: 端口是用于音频设备的输入或输出的简单线路。

trans-unit.source: Ports are simple lines for input or output of audio to or from audio devices. Common examples of ports that act as source lines (mixer inputs) include the microphone, line input, and CD-ROM drive. Ports that act as target lines (mixer outputs) include the speaker, headphone, and line output. You can access port using a Port.Info object.
trans-unit.target: 端口是用于将音频输入到音频设备或从音频设备输出音频的简单线路。用作源线路（混音器输入）的端口的常见示例包括麦克风，线路输入和CD-ROM驱动器。用作目标线路（混音器输出）的端口包括扬声器，耳机和线路输出。您可以使用 Port.Info 对象访问端口。

trans-unit.source: Ports are simple lines for input or output of audio to or from audio devices. Common examples of ports that act as source lines (mixer inputs) include the microphone, line input, and CD-ROM drive. Ports that act as target lines (mixer outputs) include the speaker, headphone, and line output. You can access port using a Port.Info object.
trans-unit.target: 端口是用于将音频输入到音频设备或从音频设备输出音频的简单线路。用作源线路（混音器输入）的端口的常见示例包括麦克风，线路输入和CD-ROM驱动器。用作目标线路（混音器输出）的端口包括扬声器，耳机和线路输出。您可以使用 Port.Info 对象访问端口。

trans-unit.source: Possible value for the anchor field. Specifies that the component should be horizontally centered and vertically aligned along the baseline of the prevailing row. If the component does not have a baseline it will be vertically centered.
trans-unit.target: anchor 字段的可能值。指定组件应沿占优势的行的基线水平居中并垂直对齐。如果组件没有基线，则它将垂直居中。

trans-unit.source: Possible value for the anchor field. Specifies that the component should be horizontally centered. Vertically the component is positioned so that its bottom edge touches the baseline of the starting row. If the starting row does not have a baseline it will be vertically centered.
trans-unit.target: anchor 字段的可能值。指定组件应水平居中。垂直放置组件，使其底部边缘接触起始行的基线。如果起始行没有基线，则它将垂直居中。

trans-unit.source: Possible value for the anchor field. Specifies that the component should be horizontally centered. Vertically the component is positioned so that its top edge touches the baseline of the starting row. If the starting row does not have a baseline it will be vertically centered.
trans-unit.target: anchor 字段的可能值。指定组件应水平居中。垂直放置组件，使其顶部边缘接触起始行的基线。如果起始行没有基线，则它将垂直居中。

trans-unit.source: Possible value for the anchor field. Specifies that the component should be horizontally placed along the leading edge. For components with a left-to-right orientation, the leading edge is the left edge. Vertically the component is aligned along the baseline of the prevailing row. If the component does not have a baseline it will be vertically centered.
trans-unit.target: anchor 字段的可能值。指定组件应沿前边缘水平放置。对于具有从左到右方向的组件，前边缘是左边缘。组件在垂直方向上沿占优势的行的基线对齐。如果组件没有基线，则它将垂直居中。

trans-unit.source: Possible value for the anchor field. Specifies that the component should be horizontally placed along the leading edge. trans-unit.source: Possible values
trans-unit.target: 可能的数值

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the element at index i to newValue if the element's current value == expectedValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.weakCompareAndSet(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的当前值 == expectedValue VarHandle.weakCompareAndSet(java.lang.Object...) ，则可能原子地将索引 i 上的元素设置为 newValue ，并且具有由VarHandle.weakCompareAndSet（java.lang.Object ...）指定的内存效果。

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the element at index i to newValue if the element's current value == expectedValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetAcquire(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的当前值 == expectedValue VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetAcquire(java.lang.Object...) ，则可能原子地将索引 i 上的元素设置为 newValue ，并且具有由VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetAcquire（java.lang.Object ...）指定的内存效果。

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the element at index i to newValue if the element's current value == expectedValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetPlain(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的当前值 == expectedValue VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetPlain(java.lang.Object...) ，则可能原子地将索引 i 上的元素设置为 newValue ，并且具有由VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetPlain（java.lang.Object ...）指定的内存效果。

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the element at index i to newValue if the element's current value == expectedValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetRelease(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的当前值 == expectedValue VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetRelease(java.lang.Object...) ，则可能原子地将索引 i 上的元素设置为 newValue ，并且具有由VarHandle.weakCompareAndSetRelease（java.lang.Object ...）指定的内存效果。

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the value of a variable to the newValue with the memory semantics of setVolatile(java.lang.Object...) if the variable's current value, referred to as the witness value, == the expectedValue, as accessed with the memory semantics of getVolatile(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 可能原子将变量到值 newValue 用的存储器语义 setVolatile(java.lang.Object...) 如果变量的当前值，被称为证人值， == 所述 expectedValue ，与存储器存取的 getVolatile(java.lang.Object...) 语义。

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the value of a variable to the newValue with the semantics of set(java.lang.Object...) if the variable's current value, referred to as the witness value, == the expectedValue, as accessed with the memory semantics of get(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 可能原子将变量到值 newValue 用的语义 set(java.lang.Object...) 如果变量的当前值，被称为证人值， == 所述 expectedValue ，与存储器存取的语义的 get(java.lang.Object...) 。

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the value of a variable to the newValue with the semantics of set(java.lang.Object...) if the variable's current value, referred to as the witness value, == the expectedValue, as accessed with the memory semantics of getAcquire(java.lang.Object...).

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the value of a variable to the newValue with the semantics of setRelease(java.lang.Object...) if the variable's current value, referred to as the witness value, == the expectedValue, as accessed with the memory semantics of get(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 可能原子将变量到值 newValue 用的语义 setRelease(java.lang.Object...) 如果变量的当前值，被称为证人值， == 所述 expectedValue ，与存储器存取的语义的 get(java.lang.Object...) 。

trans-unit.source: Possibly atomically sets the value to newValue if the current value == expectedValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.weakCompareAndSet(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 如果当前值 == expectedValue 值，则可能原子地将值设置为 newValue ，并且具有由 VarHandle.weakCompareAndSet(java.lang.Object...) 指定的内存效果。

trans-unit.source: Possibly attempts to cancel and/or stop all tasks, and reject all subsequently submitted tasks.
trans-unit.target: 可能试图取消和/或停止所有任务,并拒绝所有随后提交的任务。
